column8: 22nd October is a working day for Grades 6 to 12. We will be following Wednesday's timetable. Timings: 8.10 a.m. to 12 noon. School buses will ply. Please note that
column12: all Saturdays (except 2nd Saturdays) will be working days (half days) for Grades 6 to 12
column14: unless intimated to you otherwise. Kindly do not plan anything on Saturdays since attendance in school is compulsory. Thank you. Principal. - NPSKRM
